title: DeAndre Hopkins' Suspension
description:
Laura, Schefter, Dan, Mina, Mel and Todd discuss DeAndre Hopkin’s 6-game suspension, Tyrann Mathieu’s 3-year agreement with the Saints, Thibodeaux being disrespected during his Giants interview, wide receiver trades, and which teams had the best and worst drafts. 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: DeAndre Hopkins Suspended, and the Honey Badger to the Saints
